text:
I have known Mr. Ausmus for some ten years. He is
of highest character and integrity, and a thorough gentleman.
He has a highly developed sense of social problems
and world understanding. His leadership ability has been
recognized by his election and re-election as the President
of the National Association of Educational Broadcasters*
His loyalty to the highest ideals of what the U.S.
stands for is unquestioned. I have personally urged him
to move tc a more central position, because I do not
feel that his full potential, which is very considerable,
is being fully realized.
I reco mend him most wholeheartedly.
Executive Director NAEB
14 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois
